snippet.title: Claire a la Mode - Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
You can support Claire a la Mode by checking out the game's Demo during Steam Next Fest next week! Team up with a friend or go it alone for a taste of a sugar-high adventure! Bake your dessert masterpiece and collect new bakers as you rise through a high-stakes bake-off full of cheaters. Fend off their decadent lackeys and against all odds, come out on top in a worldwide baking frenzy

Wishlist Claire a la Mode on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2292860/Claire_a_la_Mode/

Buy Curse Crackers on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1726760/Curse_Crackers_For_Whom_the_Belle_Toils/

Follow Colorgrave on Twitter:
https://x.com/ColorgraveGames 

Subscribe to our Channel!
